attributes.action: Strict enforcement of lockdown measures, upon protests of large numbers.
attributes.additional_details: current scenes of protesting has 100s of people gathering while defeating the last 10 to 11 weeks of lockdown. Thousands of people have lost their lives fighting this pandemic and for people to have such a disregard for those sacrifices. The government had in place that people could meet up to 6 people, outside their household while social distancing. This doesn’t say 100s! Even with masks, and sanitation the virus can still spread. As these methods have been proven to not be fully affective.
attributes.background: To enforce lockdown measures and issue fines for people not following lockdown measure, including on those people in protests. Should encourage protests to go online and provide other methods for people to voice their opinion, while large protests are not allowed.
